content: Does anyone know where one can buy Ferris plushies (similar to this) - preferably benefitting someone in the Rust community?
Not helpful but, I have that one and I love it!

maybe try asking edunham directly ? https://twitter.com/qedunham

(I do have a couple of those as well, and they look great as christmas tree ornaments)

I was also wondering something similar, does rust has an official marketplace where we can buy merch ? Like a hat, or a mug ?
And if not, whatâ€™s known as a good and safe website to buy from
Nothing official but there is a list here https://users.rust-lang.org/t/all-the-rust-swag/7036
